sentences.en: Accidental inhalation of the powder can be harmful.
sentences.cn: 意外的粉尘吸入可能有害。

sentences.en: an accidental discharge of toxic waste
Buy an insurance policy that covers accidental damage .
sentences.cn: 购买一份意外损害保单。

sentences.en: E was kind of zig - zagging across the pavement, and I bumps into'im accidental - like.
sentences.cn: 他有点歪歪斜斜地在人行道上走, 我一不小心撞到了他的怀里.

sentences.en: Even their agonies have an accidental effect of clownishness.
sentences.cn: 即便是他们的极度痛苦地带有一种滑稽的意味.

sentences.en: It is by no means accidental.

sentences.cn: 这完全是一次偶然的相会.

sentences.en: My own accidental cut across the knuckles was a flea - bite.
sentences.cn: 我指关节上的意外刀伤根本算不了什么.

sentences.en: Our meeting in New York was quite accidental.
sentences.cn: 我们在纽约的会见完全是偶然的.
我们的相遇是很偶然的.

sentences.en: Signal which prevents accidental operation by spurious signals or avoids possible ambiguity.
sentences.cn: 防止假信号的意外作用或者避免二义性而设置的信号.

sentences.en: The abortion arose from an accidental fall.
sentences.cn: 流产是由于(孕妇)不慎摔倒所致.

sentences.en: The firm's intentions were laid open by the director's accidental remark.
sentences.cn: 公司的打算被董事偶然的谈话给透露了.

sentences.en: The rash of accidental shootings underscores how difficult it will be to restore order here.
sentences.cn: 一连串的意外枪击事件凸显了恢复该地区的秩序有多困难。

words.tran_cn: 事故；意外；[法] 意外事件；机遇
计划外的,意料外的,随意的
额外的,不必要的,可有可无的

phrases.tran_cn: 偶然误差；偶然性错误；随机误差

trans.tran_en: happening without being planned or intended

trans.tran_cn: 次要方面；非主要的特性；临时记号
